mapper.select: SELECT CM.COT_ID , CM.CONTENT_ID , CM.TITLE , DM.FIRST_IMAGE AS IMG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(FI.EVENT_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_START_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(FI.EVENT_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_END_DATE , CM.READ_COUNT FROM CONTENT_MASTER CM INNER JOIN DATABASE_MASTER DM ON CM.COT_ID = DM.COT_ID INNER JOIN FESTIVAL_INTRO FI ON DM.COT_ID = FI.COT_ID ORDER BY CONTENT_ID ASC LIMIT 10 ;

SELECT CM.* , DM.FIRST_IMAGE AS IMG_ID , DM.HOMEPAGE AS HOMEPAGE , DATE_FORMAT(FI.EVENT_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_START_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(FI.EVENT_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EVENT_END_DATE , CM.READ_COUNT , DM.OVER_VIEW AS OVIEW , DM.ADDR1 AS ADDR FROM CONTENT_MASTER CM INNER JOIN DATABASE_MASTER DM ON CM.COT_ID = DM.COT_ID INNER JOIN FESTIVAL_INTRO FI ON DM.COT_ID = FI.COT_ID WHERE CONTENT_ID = ${content_id} ORDER BY CONTENT_ID ASC ;
SELECT t.TAG_NAME FROM CONTENT_MASTER CM INNER JOIN CONTENT_TAGS ct ON ct.COT_ID = CM.COT_ID INNER JOIN TAGS t ON t.TAG_ID = ct.TAG_ID WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{content_id};
